attributes.action: We cannot have Blur close the Olympics
attributes.additional_details: We need to celebrate our Music. Blur are an embarrassment to this country and we need a world wide supergroup to close the Olympics..such as Duran Duran, The Rollings Stones, The Who not someone who struggle to put 2 chords together. Please get an alternative headline group to close the Olympics.

rejection.details: This is a matter for LOCOG.
